Title: IdentifyUI - An automation tool to identify objects
Description:
IdentifyUI - An automation tool to identify objects
It works only on windows operating system. It has been tested on Windows XP.
HomeWiki:
IdentifyUI - An automation tool to identify objects

This tool is developed keeping in mind the need to identify windows objects. The entire UI Automation framework is developed in such a way that the existing objects on the desktop will be represented in the form of a tree.

This tool displays the various properties of an object when it is selected which can be used by developers and testers to work on that object for their various automation needs.
